testcase.classname: Verify All Products and product detail page Test
testcase.name: Test Case 8
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks on 'Products' button to see products.......................passed Then Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully.............passed Then The products list is visible...........................................passed Then Click on 'View Product' of first product...............................passed Then User is landed to product detail page..................................passed Then Verify that detail detail is visible: product name, category, price, availability, condition, brand.passed
